results.title: Increased platelet adhesion and aggregation in hypertensive patients: effect of atenolol.
results.text_hl: @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@Hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ appear to have increased in vitro @DISEASE_Blood_Platelet_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001791 @@@platelet adhesion and aggregation@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ significantly reduced platelet adhesion, but had little effect on @<m>DISEASE_Myopathies_Structural_Congenital</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020914 @@@aggregation@@@.

citations.NLM: Markel A, Brook JG, Levy Y, Aviram M, Youdim MB. Increased platelet adhesion and aggregation in hypertensive patients: effect of atenolol. Br J Clin Pharmacol. 1983 Dec;16(6):663-8. PMID: 6661351
